org.trianacode.gui.action.taskgraph

Class TrianaWorkflowVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.action.taskgraph.TrianaWorkflowVerifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkflowVerifier, WorkflowVerifierConstants

    public class TrianaWorkflowVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorkflowVerifier
    Checks a pre-run workflow to see whether it has any ProtoServices, and if so prompts the user to distribute these services or cancel the run.
